subject: dual mode shifter
description_text:
Hello, just keeping in touch about the dual mode shifter, we agreed on
a sponsor deal for media of it with all the simsonn ecosystem on my custom
rig,and possibly a release date on when you guys are gonna be releasing
soon? I was also curious if you had specs on it at all?

for promo i can supply a couple different video clips of different angles
and some glamour shots of it on the rig with all the other simpson products
i own already

big fan of the products and happy to be able to work with you guys!

-dalton dean

conversations.body_text: Hello Dalton Uhl,    Our dual-mode shifter is expected to be released in November, though detailed specifications are not yet available.

Thats very soon, im most definitely excited!

Is there anything I need to do for you guys before its released or just
contact you again when it's released with my shipping information?

I supply a photo of my rig and all the simsonn products I already own and
would be shooting the promo videos and photos around



On Tue, Oct 21, 2025, 2:37â€¯AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Dalton Uhl,    Thank you for your support. You may contact us after the product launch to request a reminder and provide your details. Enjoy!

Hello, just contacting you about the sponsorship of the dual mode shifter
In exchange for pictures and videos of it in use on my rig with rest of the
simsonn product line I currently own. Prox ultra pedals, vam pro haptics,
hexagon h pattern shifter, and hb pro handbrake.

 My contact information is
Dalton Uhl
12 w Pennsylvania dr. Unit 1, tucson arizona 85714. Phone number
785-250-5540
